name: Quantum Bullet
description:
HOW TO PLAY:

Get to the door after getting the key. You can fire bullets at enemies to link with them. You only have a set number of bullets though!

CONTROLS

WASD - Move

SPACE - Fire Tether Bullet/Untether

R - Restart

--------------
